# backwardFlow

**Instance Property**

The backward optical flow pixel buffer that was provided when the object was created.

## Declaration

```swift
var backwardFlow: CVPixelBuffer { get }
```

## Inspecting the configuration

- **forwardFlow**: The forward optical flow pixel that was provided when the object was created.
